review: Before purchasing the Amazon Fire TV stick, I read through the reviews. What I should have done was google "problems with Amazon fire TV stick". When I set it up and instantly had problems with it keeping a connection to my wifi, I went to the Internet for assistance with resolving the issue. What I found was an alarming number of people that were having the same problem, dating back to when this was first released and still no fix. It's a concern when they are aware of a problem with their product, but don't seem interested in correcting it. Since that first day, I can also report that when I try to use the fire TV stick, and it manages to keep a connection to the wifi, although it shows I am logged in, when I try to watch anything, it asks if I want a free 30 day trial to Amazon prime. I am an Amazon prime member. This issue can only be resolved by unplugging the stick and plugging it back in. Then, the next time I turn it on, I get to do it all over again. Streaming video is wonderful, easy, and more and more, the way most of us watch video. Unfortunately, you won't be doing a lot of streaming with the fire stick, swearing yes, streaming, no.
author: ReeseGilbert "reesie"

review: I ordered this with the intent of using it on a tv in my husband's workout area. He isn't very good with technology but can operate Samsung Smart TV features on our tv's that are wifi equipped.  I assumed this would be super easy to use. I've used apple tv and other similar devices but I couldn't get past registration with this device. It kept telling me my amazon password was incorrect and it wasn't (yes I am 100% sure) and I kept getting a notification that if I had enabled device notifications to check my phone (???) that totally confused me but I checked my phone and nothing was there.  Also checked email.  THEN I looked online and saw that others have had the same problem and there are links to connect with the "fire tv team".  Problem is that I needed something that was virtually fool-proof in order for my husband to use it. So unfortunately it's going back. I wanted to love it and was excited to get it but the set-up glitch made me nervous
